definition: fused ribs (physical deformity)
surname Pian

flank (the side of one's torso)/to coerce/to threaten
variant of 脅|胁[xie2]

Ma Fuzi (-260 BC), hapless general of Zhao 趙國|赵国, who famously led an army of 400,000 to total annihilation at battle of Changping 長平之戰|长平之战 in 260 BC/also called Zhao Kuo 趙括|赵括
the lord of Lu (who declined to employ Confucius)
to look over one's shoulder constantly (like a wolf)/to be fearful
(treat as a) favorite

Jiao Yao/legendary dwarf/legendary pygmy race/archaic name of a southwestern non-Han tribe
swine

minor (old usage, person under 20)
lit. fish bone of a minister (idiom); fig. person one can rely on for candid criticism
